description: Structured information describing the terminology used in a brain atlas.

alias._instruction: Enter the user-defined identifier for this atlas terminology (e.g. a short name).

anatomicalEntities._instruction: Add one or several anatomical entities (terms) that are part of this atlas terminology.

definedIn._instruction: Add one or several files in which this atlas terminology is defined in.

fullName._instruction: Enter a descriptive name for this atlas terminology.

relatedOntology._instruction: Enter the identifier (IRI) of the related ontological term that best describes this atlas terminology.
